about_the_game:
The 9800-9840 Series was delivered to Canadian Pacific Railway between the years of 2004/2005. This was the very last CP AC4400CW order from GE which was replaced in 2005 by the ES44 Series. This model is a representation of this series between the years 2010 to Current. Cabs are exactly created to prototype and feature the GE Trip Optimer and PTC modifications.

Features…

4 different skins
Realistic Specular/normal map texture effects
Air Hoses and MU Cables
Functioning and interactive computer screen
Functioning dynamic brakes
Auto Running Numbers
Road specific highly detailed cab view
Scripted cab functions
Realistic in-cab sounds
Openable engine compartment doors,
Openable Front and Rear cab doors,
Highest qualify GE 7FDL engine sound recording in Trainz

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: The 9800-9840 Series was delivered to Canadian Pacific Railway between the years of 2004/2005. This was the very last CP AC4400CW order from GE which was replaced in 2005 by the ES44 Series. This model is a representation of this series between the years 2010 to today, with a highly detailed cab.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
